snippet: France expects that the United Nations Security Council will authorize the deployment of a multinational African military force to regain control of the country’s north.
abstract: France expects that United Nations Security Council will authorize deployment of multinational African military force in Mali, but that operations to regain control of country's north would begin no earlier than August or September.
lead_paragraph: France expects that the United Nations Security Council will authorize the deployment of a multinational African military force to regain control of the country’s north.

headline.seo: Multinational Military Force Expected for Mali
headline.main: France: Multinational Military Force Expected for Mali
headline.print_headline: France: Multinational Military Force Expected for Mali
